channel.title: silicon republic on Cork OpenCoffee
channel.description: Recent content in silicon republic on Cork OpenCoffee

item.title: Nice piece on OpenCoffee in Silicon Republic
item.description: Marie Boran from Silicon Republic has always taken a strong interest in Irish start-up activity. I remember she was the first to get in contact when Paddy’s Valley was announced. She has written a very nice piece in today’s Silicon Republic (not sure if it’ll be syndicated to Irish Independent or not) about OpenCoffee in Ireland. You can follow Marie on Twitter here. They’ve also enabled a feed of their stories to Twitter here.
